summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by removing the capacity line from the Little Sprouts Program Details grid and the Home page details card area shown, and REQ-3 is implemented by rendering the new decorative Oregon flower images on HomePage with non-interactive/aria-hidden styling. However, REQ-2 (adding the actual PNG assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames) is not reflected in the diff (no files added).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add at least three new Oregon-flower illustration PNGs (transparent background) under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows zero added files; only references to the new asset filenames were added in HomePage.tsx, but the PNG files themselves are not added under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx (references /assets/generated/ls-oregon-flower-*.png, but no corresponding added files shown)
